Articles.Content:
The B4T is a sub Project of a much larger space station cruiser build I've recently finished. The B4T was designed to be a flyable atmospheric re-entry vehicle. Unusual as it may seem, she totes a tilted engine to compensate for the off-set center of mass created by adding that-thur tilted fuselage piece, because I can. She handles decent enough in Kerbin atmosphere but is highly un-recommended for Duna atmospheric flight. Though, the brave souls who try and fly her at Duna will surely thank me for the spare parachutes  Also, doesn't she look kinda like a bat?

                                                  Download her NOW
